Key Match Events: Indonesia was held to a 2-2 draw against Bahrain
Ragnar Oratmangoen equalized for Indonesia before halftime
Rafael Struick scored a stunning curling goal to give Indonesia a 2-1 lead
Mohamed Mahroon scored twice for Bahrain, the second goal coming in the 98th minute to level the score
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was marred by controversy as the referee allowed play to continue beyond the allotted time
Others: The Indonesian national team lodged a strong protest against the referee's decision
The public, especially Indonesian netizens, reacted strongly to the incident
The hashtag #Wasit became a trending topic in Indonesia with over 212,000 tweets
